From the struggles we’ve endured to the achievements we’ve made, it’s time for more Americans & future generations to know our story & a National Museum of Asian Pacific American History & Culture will provide the physical space for people to learn how we have helped... 3/5

make America the country it is today. It will help ensure more Americans understand that Asian Pacific American history IS American history. I thank all who helped to get my bill over the finish line & look forward to the study for establishing this museum beginning soon. 4/5

Protecting our kids must be our nation’s top priority. I’m proud to have helped pass the #ProtectingOurKidsAct out of the House that would help move us in that direction. However, this is a first step & our job is not done. We must cont. to curb #GunViolence to protect our kids!

Passing the Protecting Our Kids Act will do just that; protect our children. Time and time again we witness horrible events, and we always wonder if this is the catalyst that spurs the necessary changes. We can no longer afford to wait. We must #EndGunViolence

60K guns move illegally across states each year. Ghost guns are another way for people to illegally obtain a gun. Title II & III in the #ProtectingOurKidsAct addresses these issues by keeping guns that are impossible to track, out of the hands of people who shouldn’t have them.

Bump stocks were made to modify guns into weapons that regular citizens weren't intended to have, coupled with banning the possession of magazines that hold more than 15 rounds as part title V & VI in the #ProtectingOurKidsAct, will protect American lives.

If an 18-year-old can’t buy a beer, they should not be able to buy a rifle or shotgun! Since 2018, 6 of the 9 deadliest mass shootings in the U.S. were caused by people who were 21 or younger. Title I raises the minimum age to buy certain rifles and shotguns to 21 from 18.
This bill includes commonsense gun safety measures that will help prevent mass shootings and save lives! There are a lot of myths surrounding effective ways to end the scourge of gun violence.
On the House floor with the @HouseDemocrats getting ready to vote on the #ProtectingOurKidsAct – a bill that would help combat the epidemic of gun violence.

Entrusting the supply of baby formula to just four companies is a threat to our economic security and public health. That’s why we must mobilize all available resources of the federal government to end this shortage and take the steps to ensure this could never happen again. 3/3
